question: My dad is 71 yrs old,chronic kidney patient with dialysis (for 10yrs now).He has gallstones (calcemic)(had attack last year & diabetes(hypoglycemia)  too.He has CHD& secondary parathyroidism,as a complication of CKD.Of lately he has frequent belching which makes him feel uneasy.From last two days he passes stool 2-3 times a day,& says he has burning sensation in anal region.His alkaline phosphatase level is very high (222).Please help us in diagonizing the problem.
title: Poor health of unknown cause
